title: Chapter 4342 - Chapter 4342: 4341 Had Completely Annihilated The Control-Level Powerhouses
body:
Chapter 4342 - Chapter 4342: 4341 Had Completely Annihilated The Control-Level Powerhouses

Chapter 4342: 4341 had completely annihilated the control-level powerhouses

Translator: 549690339

“They are not moving. Hehe, are they waiting for me to get closer?”

Wang Xian was flying rapidly in this space.

He was not far away. Wang Xian could sense the auras of Saint Futu and Saint Haoyang.

Seeing that they were not moving, the corners of Wang Xian’s mouth curled up slightly.

This method of concealing his figure with the power of chaos was indeed powerful.

Wang Xian was flying at the speed of a ruler at the peak of the realm!

“I can make my move now!”

When he was very close to Saint Futu and Saint Haoyang.

His gaze focused slightly.

Wang Xian’s body immediately transformed into the body of a divine dragon.

The incomparably huge dragon body directly enveloped the surrounding space.

The dragon tail and dragon body directly enveloped Saint Futu and Saint Haoyang.

“Explode!”

Wang Xian shouted in a low voice. An unparalleled energy attacked them!

“What?”

“Oh no, damn it, it’s that Dragon King! How is this possible!”

Saint Futu and Saint Haoyang, who were hiding in the two meteorites, looked horrified when they saw the sudden attack.

They never expected that the Dragon King would return.

He had even come to kill them.

What frightened them the most was how the Dragon King knew where they were?

Especially Saint Futu, whose expression changed drastically.

Now he finally understood why he had a feeling of being locked on.

The sudden attack completely terrified Saint Futu and Saint Haoyang.

They immediately wanted to escape into the distance.

However, the terrifying power completely enveloped them.

Even if they had the most precious treasure to flee for their lives, it was too late for them to use it now!

“Dragon King, we will not live under the same sky as you!”

Saint Haoyang roared furiously with a ferocious look on his face!

He had killed them twice. They had already been killed twice!

They must take revenge for this!

They had to take revenge!

“Die!”

Wang Xian stared at them with disdain.

The terrifying energy quickly wiped out their vitality.

They did not have the ability to escape!

The two experts who had not recovered to their peak state could not put up any resistance.

After Wang Xian killed them, he waved his arm and kept their corpses.

A smile appeared on his face!

The lamp of divination!

Wang Xian took out the lamp of divination and immediately divined the location of their resurrection.

After being killed by Wang Xian, Saint Futu and Saint Haoyang had their strength reduced once again.

This made it easier for Wang Xian to perform divination.

“You won’t be able to escape from there!”

Wang Xian divined the location of the two of them and smiled.

He moved and immediately flew towards their location.

At the same time, it was a remote place in the universe.

This was a newborn planet.

The entire planet was still in a very primitive state!

This was the place where the two of them were resurrected.

In this planet, they had placed resurrection treasures.

However, the aura on their bodies had become weaker after this resurrection!

Their strength was only at the initial stage of the Heavenly Yuan creation realm.

And it was at the weakest level!

The two of them broke out of the two strange eggs.

They looked at each other, and their expressions were abnormally ugly. They immediately absorbed the energy from the egg shells!

When the energy from the two egg shells was completely absorbed by them, the two of them took a deep breath!

“That Damn Dragon King, why did he attack us again?”

The Haoyang saint growled in a low voice with an incomparably ferocious expression!

His expression looked incomparably crazy!

They had always been on a smooth path, but ever since the calamity began, they had suffered a huge blow from the Dragon King.

This made his heart incomparably violent!

But, there was no other way!

He was unwilling!

“No wonder I have a feeling of being locked on. I don’t know what method that Dragon King used to lock onto us.”

Saint Futu’s expression changed drastically as he spoke!

“What about now? Futu, do you have that feeling of being locked on?”

Saint Haoyang’s heart tightened when he heard that.

He was afraid that the Dragon King could still lock onto them!

“I can’t sense them now. I don’t know if it’s because I’m weaker or because I’ve escaped this lock!”

Saint Futu shook his head, feeling a little uneasy!

“Then what should we do now?”

The vast sun saint’s heart tightened as well. If they were still locked onto, what would they do?

“Wait here. If he can really lock onto us, we won’t be able to escape even if we want to!”

Saint Futu shook his head.

Yes, right now, their strength was comparable to the weakest heaven origin creation realm expert.

If they were really locked onto, then they wouldn’t be able to escape either!

Right now, the only way was to wait here.

To confirm if the two of them were still locked onto!

This made them feel helpless as if they were resigned to fate!

They were control realm experts after all!

Yet, they had fallen to such a state!

“Huff! Huff!”

The two of them took a deep breath.

“We’re Here!”

Ten years later, Wang Xian was flying rapidly in the Na Tian universe.

He looked at a life planet in front of him with a smile on his face.

He could sense the auras of Saint Futu and Saint Haoyang on that life planet.

“I only have the strength of someone who has just stepped into the Heaven’s origin creation stage. Hehe!”

Wang Xian smiled lightly and flew over while concealing his figure.

He had powerful concealment techniques and a huge difference in strength.

When Wang Xian approached the planet, they did not sense his arrival!

Buzz

Wang Xian teleported and arrived in front of them.

“You can’t escape. Die!”

Wang Xian smiled coldly as a wave of energy enveloped them.

“No!”

Both of them widened their eyes as despair filled their faces!

PFFT

Wang Xian moved his palm and killed them instantly!

“Hehe!”

Wang Xian smiled. He moved his palm and took out the divination lamp to continue his divination.

“HMM?”

“The place of resurrection this time is so far away. The consumption of the divination lamp is too great!”

At this moment, Wang Xian saw the divination message and frowned slightly.

This time, the place where Saint Futu and Saint Haoyang were resurrected was very far away.

It was so far away that Wang Xian had to fly for tens of thousands of years!

Moreover, because of the distance, he could only divine a vague location.

This caused Wang Xian to shake his head helplessly.

Every Heaven’s fate level powerhouse has three guesses. It will be extremely difficult to completely destroy them

Wang Xian thought to himself.

With a move of his palm, he set up a few demon spirit altars in the entire na Tian universe.

Then, with a thought, he took out a map that he obtained from the evil sequence faction’s powerhouse and started to investigate.

“This place?”

Very soon, Wang Xian found the location predicted by the divination lamp on the map.

He raised his eyebrows.

This place was relatively close to the six paths universe.

He would head to the six paths universe first. He estimated that he would reach it after flying for a few thousand years!
